short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will quiz you on World Capitals

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fun and Educational! Useful for Remote Learning and fast Review!

This is a Chrome Extension that will quiz you on your World Capitals of Countries and Territories around the world, all in your browser, making it not only fun but also accessible at any time of day for a fun break.

Rules
__________________
Write your word in the answer box and click the SPACE bar to submit, if it is correct, it will take you to the next question , if it is wring, nothing will happen. If you do not know this capital, you can click the ENTER key to restart from a score of 0
